abstract: The Russian Internet company Mail.ru, which is part owned by the billionaire Alisher Usmanov, sold its Facebook stake for around $525 million.
snippet: The Russian Internet company Mail.ru, which is part owned by the billionaire Alisher Usmanov, sold its Facebook stake for around $525 million.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 12:05 p.m. | LONDON – More than a year after Facebook’s botched initial public offering, investors are now reaping rewards.

headline.main: Russian Tech Giant Cashes In on Facebook’s Recovery
headline.print_headline: Russian Firm Cashes In On Facebook’s Recovery

byline.original: By Mark Scott and Andrew E. Kramer
